Package DAO

Class AppointmentDAO

java.lang.Object
DAO.AppointmentDAO
public class AppointmentDAO extends Object
Handles all database operations related to appointments. This class is responsible for creating, updating, deleting, and fetching appointment data from the database. It provides methods to: - Retrieve all appointments or specific subsets based on various criteria such as customer or contact. - Add new appointments to the database with detailed information including start and end times, descriptions, and associated user and customer details. - Update existing appointment records when changes are made. - Delete appointments from the database. - Count appointments based on type and time criteria, useful for reporting and analytics. - Fetch unique appointment types for dynamic filtering or categorization within the application. Each method ensures data integrity and handles SQL exceptions to maintain robustness of the application's data access layer.

  • Method Details

    • getAllAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointments()
      Retrieves all appointments from the database, joining with customer and contact tables to enrich the appointment data. Orders the appointments by creation date.
      Returns:
      an ObservableList of all appointments in the database.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is a problem executing the query.

    • getAllAppointmentsForCustomer

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointmentsForCustomer(int Customer_ID)
      Fetches all appointments for a specific customer from the database. Filters appointments based on the provided customer ID.
      Parameters:
      Customer_ID - The ID of the customer for whom appointments are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      an ObservableList of Appointment objects specific to the given customer.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is a problem executing the query.

    • createAppointment

      public static void createAppointment(String Title, String Description, String Location, String Type, ZonedDateTime Start, ZonedDateTime End, int Customer_ID, int User_ID, int Contact_ID)
      Inserts a new appointment into the database with detailed information including title, description, location, type, and timing.
      Parameters:
      Title - The title of the appointment.
      Description - The description of the appointment.
      Location - The location of the appointment.
      Type - The type of the appointment.
      Start - The start time of the appointment, in UTC.
      End - The end time of the appointment, in UTC.
      Customer_ID - The customer ID related to the appointment.
      User_ID - The user ID related to the appointment.
      Contact_ID - The contact ID related to the appointment.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error during the query execution.

    • editAppointment

      public static void editAppointment(String Title, String Description, String Location, String Type, ZonedDateTime Start, ZonedDateTime End, int Customer_ID, int User_ID, int Contact_ID, int Appointment_ID)
      Updates an existing appointment in the database with new details.
      Parameters:
      Title - The new title of the appointment.
      Description - The new description of the appointment.
      Location - The new location of the appointment.
      Type - The new type of the appointment.
      Start - The new start time of the appointment, adjusted to UTC.
      End - The new end time of the appointment, adjusted to UTC.
      Customer_ID - The customer ID related to the appointment.
      User_ID - The user ID related to the appointment.
      Contact_ID - The contact ID related to the appointment.
      Appointment_ID - The ID of the appointment to update.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error during the update process.

    • deleteAppointmentFromDB

      public static void deleteAppointmentFromDB(int Appointment_ID)
      Deletes an appointment from the database based on the provided appointment ID.
      Parameters:
      Appointment_ID - The ID of the appointment to be deleted.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error executing the deletion query.

    • fetchAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> fetchAppointments(LocalDate start, LocalDate end)
      Fetches appointments from the database within a specified date range.
      Parameters:
      start - The start date to filter the appointments.
      end - The end date to filter the appointments.
      Returns:
      an ObservableList of appointments within the specified date range.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is a problem executing the query.

    • getUpcomingAppointmentForUser

      public static Appointment getUpcomingAppointmentForUser(ZoneId userTimeZone) throws SQLException
      Fetches the nearest upcoming appointment for a user based on the current time adjusted to UTC and considering a 15-minute window. The user's time zone is used to adjust the appointment time to the local time zone for display.
      Parameters:
      userTimeZone - The time zone to adjust the appointment times to.
      Returns:
      The next upcoming appointment if it exists within 15 minutes of the current UTC time; otherwise, null.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is a database access error.

    • getUpcomingAppointment

      public static Appointment getUpcomingAppointment(ZoneId userTimeZone) throws SQLException
      Queries the database for the next upcoming appointment within a 15-minute window from now, using UTC times for comparison. Converts fetched UTC appointment times to the user's local time zone for accurate display and evaluation.
      Parameters:
      userTimeZone - The user's local time zone for correct time display.
      Returns:
      An upcoming appointment if available within the next 15 minutes, otherwise null.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is a database access error or the query fails to execute.

    • getUserIdFromUserName

      public static int getUserIdFromUserName(String userName) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the user ID associated with a given username from the database. This method is crucial for operations requiring user identification beyond just username checks, such as logging and user-specific data retrieval.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username whose user ID is being queried.
      Returns:
      The user ID corresponding to the provided username or -1 if the user does not exist or an error occurs.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an error during the database access.

    • getAppointmentsPerContact

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAppointmentsPerContact(Contact contact)
      Retrieves all appointments associated with a specific contact from the database. This method is used to filter appointments by contact, which is useful for displaying user-specific appointment data.
      Parameters:
      contact - The contact whose appointments are to be fetched.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList containing all appointments linked to the specified contact.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is a database access error.

    • countAppointmentsByTypeAndMonth

      public static int countAppointmentsByTypeAndMonth(String type, int month)
      Counts the number of appointments of a specified type occurring in a specific month. This method is useful for generating statistics and reports on appointment data.
      Parameters:
      type - The type of appointments to count.
      month - The month for which to count appointments.
      Returns:
      The number of appointments matching the specified type and month.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an error executing the count query.

    • fetchAppointmentTypes

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<String> fetchAppointmentTypes()
      Retrieves a distinct list of all appointment types from the database. This method is typically used to populate type selection controls or for filtering purposes.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList containing the distinct types of appointments.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an error during database access.

    • getCountOfAppointmentsForNextDay

      public static int getCountOfAppointmentsForNextDay()
      Counts all appointments scheduled for the next day from the current date. This method can be used to prepare or alert users about upcoming appointments.
      Returns:
      The total number of appointments scheduled for the next day.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an error executing the count query.

    • deleteAllAppointmentsForCustomer

      public static void deleteAllAppointmentsForCustomer(int customerID) throws SQLException
      Deletes all appointments associated with a given customer from the database.
      Parameters:
      customerID - The ID of the customer whose appointments are to be deleted.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs or the delete operation fails.
